seasonality_snapshot.heading: Seasonality Snapshot - September TSLA Returns (2020-2025)
seasonality_snapshot.sample_note: Sample size N: 6 years (including partial current year)

exec_summary.key_points: Above 50-day SMA (328.52) & 200-day SMA (330.80). RSI 74.8, MACD 10.7. ATR 13.75 signals elevated volatility. September shows +6.3% avg return.

trend_levels.note: Recent price breakouts confirmed by volume strength.

seasonality.note: September average return +6.3%, N=6 years, supportive for continuation of positive trend in current month.

scenarios_risks.title: Risk
scenarios_risks.text: RSI above 70 signals short-term overbought correction.

scenarios_risks.title: Invalidated
scenarios_risks.text: If price falls below 320 (below SMA zone). Watch volume for confirmation or reversal signals.

volume_dynamics.title: Volume Spikes on Rallies
volume_dynamics.text: Volume spikes on rallies bolster bullish trend.

volume_dynamics.title: Absence of Volume Spikes on Pullbacks
volume_dynamics.text: Absence of volume spikes on pullbacks facilitates trend resilience.

insights.title: Strong Recovery & Momentum
insights.text: Strong recovery from oversold conditions seen in prior Septembers, current-year momentum in September far stronger than prior years.

insights.title: SMA Proximity Critical Zone
insights.text: Close proximity of 50- and 200-day SMA amplifies support; usually a critical inflection zone for price stability or corrections.

analyst_table.takeaway: Overbought, watch for possible near-term pullback
Elevated volatility suggesting potential for swings
Volume confirms buying strength on rallies
Volatility spike — snapbacks likely; manage risk
Positive tailwind this month; aligns with upmove
Squeeze dynamic: Up/more up, then fast correction risk

summary_proposal.summary: TSLA remains fundamentally and technically bullish with impressive YoY gains and strong support from moving averages. Momentum readings signal strong buyer control, though RSI warns of near-term overextension. Seasonality for September is positive, supporting continuation potential. Critical support near 330-335 should hold to sustain the uptrend, while volume patterns validate current price action. Monitor RSI and MACD for early signs of momentum shift and potential pullbacks.
